TopicTitle: New Steam KSP intall fails to launch

Articles.Content:
Tech Specs:

Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit (laptop)

4GB RAM

AMD A6-3410MX with Radeon HD Graphis 1.60GHz

Video Drivers are up to date.

I just re-imaged the laptop after a major OS crash. Downloaded .24 from steam. Moved files to my desktop. No mods. Attempted to open KSP_64 and failed to launch. Tried to run as admin, same thing here is my crash file. Any help would be good. The game loaded just fine prior to re-imaging and it was modded.

On another note. I am not very savvy. So if you could explain any repair attempts in plain English would be helpful. Thanks in advance.

Error Log http://pastebin.com/M4ULcFhY

Event Log http://pastebin.com/K7P7pS8N

Edited September 2, 2014 by sumghai
Exactly how were you attempting to run KSP? From Steam? Because the KSP.exe (or KSP_x64.exe) was never run; it says it ran the Launcher.exe, which should not happen when running the Steam version.

I figured it out. I was only using the default video card. Once I downloaded the correct video driver it worked just fine. BTW I tried to run the KSP_x64 shortcut from the folder and the shortcut created at install. Thank you for the quick response. NOW TIME FOR ROCKETS!!!!
